attributes.action: review current door safe licence laws
attributes.additional_details: After a young man being left fighting for his life, after being ejected from a nightclub, we feel a change in the law and current guideline should be looked at again. Door staff should be made to retrain after ONE use off extreme force if it can be proven it was not intended to harm, and instant dismissal where an individual has be hospitalised through extreme force...we feel that no matter the reason no one should be left fighting for their life
